mapper.insert: insert into review values(vi_seq.nextval, #{vi_subject}, #{vi_content}, #{vi_hash, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vi_star, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{username}, #{name}, #{hos_name}, sysdate, #{rno})
mapper.select: select b.* from (select rownum as rm, a.* from( select * from review order by vino desc)a)b where b.rm >= #{startPage} and b.rm <= #{endPage}
mapper.insert: insert into review_com values(cno_seq.nextval, #{com_content}, #{vino}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from review_com where vino=#{vino} order by cno
mapper.update: update review set vi_content=#{vi_content}, vi_hash=#{vi_hash}, vi_star=#{vi_star}, vi_date=sysdate where vino=#{vino}
update review_com set com_content=#{com_content}, com_date=sysdate where cno=#{cno}
mapper.select: select b.* from (select rownum as rm, a.* from( select * from review where vi_hash like '%' || #{vi_hash} || '%' order by vino desc)a)b where b.rm >= #{startPage} and b.rm <= #{endPage}
